effect_entries.effect:
Held
:   When the holder takes damage directly from a move and does not faint, it switches out for another non-fainted Pokémon in its party, as chosen by the Trainer.
This effect does not activate if another effect prevents the holder from switching out.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: When the holder takes damage from a move, it switches out for a party Pokémon of the Trainer’s choice.

flavor_text_entries.text: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder is hit by an attack, it will be switched out of battle.
